channel.title: Quick help 317
channel.description: Alright, I've been having this problem ever since I started my server, I have no idea what the problem is. When you logout and try to login you have like a 1\2 chance of not being able to login. It says"You have been IP banned..." Some shit like that. I think it means the connection is slow or something, but they have to wait like 30minutes to an hour to log back in. Does anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Quick help 317
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Alright, I’ve been having this problem ever since I started my server, I have no idea what the problem is. When you logout and try to login you have like a 1\2 chance of not being able to login. It says"You have been IP banned…" Some shit like that. I think it means the connection is slow or something, but they have to wait like 30minutes to an hour to log back in. Does anyone know how to fix this?

Read full topic
